I'm your host, Darren Van Dam!

Today, I’m breaking down a bunch of shockingly good movies that just hit Netflix—titles that look unassuming at first but end up being way better than you ever expected. If you enjoy finding underrated gems or movies you skipped because they didn’t look like much, this lineup is full of shocking surprises.

Some of these films flew completely under the radar, others were dismissed when they came out, and a couple never reached the audience they deserved. Once you hit play, these flicks deliver—strong performances, bold concepts, and way more entertainment value than their reputation or lack of reputatio
title: 10 SHOCKINGLY Good Movies Netflix Just Added
